name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: I bought this hair oil after viewing so many good comments. But this product is not good enough.First of all it's Expensive...Second thing the amount of the product is low (half bottle) YES!The bottle is not completely filled with oil. If you cheating on your customers #Mamaearth trust me on this you can't fool people more than once. Now I know that your Brand is not good enough. I am not going to buy any product from your Brand again.Thumbs down for mamaearth onion oil !!

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: Used This Mama Earth Newly Launched Onion Oil twice, and i must say im already impressed by the results !It prevents hair loss, helps control premature greying, dryness, dandruff, scalp eruptions and many other hair problems after its regular use !To avoid dry and frizzy hair, make sure that you use this oil to your hairs twice a week.Oiling provides your scalp with essential nutrients, and also strengthens the hair roots. Mamaearth onion oil works best for your hair during all the seasons.
cleaned_review: used mama earth newly launched onion oil twice must say im already impressed results prevents hair loss helps control premature greying dryness dandruff scalp eruptions many hair problems regular use avoid dry frizzy hair make sure use oil hairs twice weekoiling provides scalp essential nutrients also strengthens hair roots mamaearth onion oil works best hair seasons

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: Product just smells similar to navarathna hair oil .. but not strong as that and oil is not sticky after applying three drops of oil !! More review after usage of 2 months1) worst product2) hair fall increased a lot3) brought this product after watching YouTube influencer Mumbaiker Nikhil4) totally misguided never take suggestions from influencers.5) using since 2 months no result and I'm losing my more hair6) mama earth just wasted my money as well damaged my hair7)better they provide solution or return my money

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: I have been trying different onion oil for my hair as my hair is not very healthy. This product has literally changed the texture of my scalp and I am really happy with the results. It comes in a nice colorful packaging too. Definitely recommend this one to everyone looking out for onion oil.  For more reviews you can follow me on Instagram @insi_lovemyself.
cleaned_review: trying different onion oil hair hair healthy product literally changed texture scalp really happy results comes nice colorful packaging definitely recommend one everyone looking onion oil reviews follow instagram insilovemyself

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: I have been using this product for some time now. My Roommate had this and I had been planning to order for a while now. I just used to forget all the time, finally I have it now.Well from the last 2 months of use, here's my experience with the product:I use it every night and get a shower in the morning.Pros:1. The oil is non greasy, and pretty light.2. Has very good smell.no pungent or awkward fragrance3. My hair doesn't lump in together as with other hair oil products.4.Gives a pretty good shine and dark color5. It's very helpful for dandruff, hairfall/ hairloss. I don't have a very dense hair presence so my scalp was visible all the time, Now it looks pretty dense.Cons.1 .can't find anything at allI do recommend it for people having hairfall issues.

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: It's a very good product from mamaearth. The oil gives your hair full strength and perfect shine. Onion are rich in sulphur thats add up the strength of hair roots and holds the hair preventing hairloss. Suitable for all type hair. For better result use at night. Go for it.
cleaned_review: good product mamaearth oil gives hair full strength perfect shine onion rich sulphur thats add strength hair roots holds hair preventing hairloss suitable type hair better result use night go

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: Why are you showing onion oil benefits in your ad , when you ate not giving onion oil in your product. I bought this for redensyl content ...but not sure about the percentage of it bein added. Secondly it only has onion extracts, which am sure not is effective.Switchin back to my conventional method of makin onion juice and applyin on scalp

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: I used it only one time so I can't say about hairfall control but I couldn't stop myself to mention about its amazing effect. It made my hair extremely soft and shiny which was visible properly. Smell was strong but not bothering. I think this is the best hair fall which I have used till date. My search ends over here I suppose. Just waiting to see its impact on arresting hairfall.

name: Mamaearth-Percent-Natural-Berry-Toothpaste
review: Nice one... My 2.5 yr old son likes to brush with this flavour- strawberry. Previously I used to use Chicco but switched to this one due to good reviews and lower price.I had used Mee Mee also but this one's ingredients are better for my child's health.
cleaned_review: nice one yr old son likes brush flavour strawberry previously used use chicco switched one due good reviews lower pricei used mee mee also ones ingredients better childs health

name: Mamaearth-Percent-Natural-Berry-Toothpaste
review: My 2 year old child doesn't have cavity but started developing bad breaths the morning after, while using this toothpaste for a couple of weeks during day and night brushing sessions. I feel this toothpaste might actually cause cavity rather than keep it away, from my experience. I immediately shifted back to Pigeon toothpaste for night brushing and the bad breath stopped from the next day onward.  I had purchased it for its all natural properties. Mama Earth team needs to research more on the ingredients on this product. I use other Mama Earth products and they are decent. Not this toothpaste though.
cleaned_review: year old child doesnt cavity started developing bad breaths morning using toothpaste couple weeks day night brushing sessions feel toothpaste might actually cause cavity rather keep away experience immediately shifted back pigeon toothpaste night brushing bad breath stopped next day onward purchased natural properties mama earth team needs research ingredients product use mama earth products decent toothpaste though

name: Mamaearth-Percent-Natural-Berry-Toothpaste
review: Berry flavoured blast that the kids just love!  And the best part is that its perfectly fine if  they swallow it too! Made with 100% safe ingredients, this should be the toothpaste you should introduce your kids to! Mamaearth Berry Blast toothpaste is 100% safe and toxin free. My kids love the Berry taste while brushing. This is one of the best flouride free tooth pastes available for kids that you should be buying right away!
cleaned_review: berry flavoured blast kids love best part perfectly fine swallow made safe ingredients toothpaste introduce kids mamaearth berry blast toothpaste safe toxin free kids love berry taste brushing one best flouride free tooth pastes available kids buying right away

name: Mamaearth-Percent-Natural-Berry-Toothpaste
review: Pros:1. Natural strawberry flavour.2. SLS & Fluoride free toothpaste.3. 100% vegan.4. Claims to be plastic responsible.Cons:None that I found in the last few months.Verdict:Recommended toothpaste for kids above 1 year. My son likes it. The strawberry flavour is quite noticeable when you're brushing your kid. Wish if this was available as single pack instead of minimum qty as 2 since it takes quite a lot of time to finish the tube when you are taking only a peanut size or less portion for brushingIf you think my review was helpful, don't forget to click the helpful link below the review.

name: Mamaearth-Natural-Turmeric-Saffron-brightning
review: I bought this because I was super impressed with the ingredients list. name: Mamaearth-Natural-Turmeric-Saffron-brightning
review: It's thick.It has beads and I don't know why they want me to scrub my face off everyday !!!It doesn't foam like a facewash.It smells like pulpy orange while applying and then smells a bit like turmeric after washing off.My face looked bright after using it but not as bright as my previous facewashes.Made my skin dry. It was annoying since my skin was already dry without it and it made it worse !It is definitely not worth the money ( I got it for 175rs in a sale.  Still isn't worth it )I don't think it worked on my tan. I still dont see any changes in skin.It's disappointing !!!!

review: It's thick.It has beads and I don't know why they want me to scrub my face off everyday !!!It doesn't foam like a facewash.It smells like pulpy orange while applying and then smells a bit like turmeric after washing off.My face looked bright after using it but not as bright as my previous facewashes.Made my skin dry. May be the product works for non-sensitive skin, product is really light, can‚Äôt tell if it gives any kind of moisture to the skin. I had to change my entire skin care routine, bought my tried and tested organic products and my skin is much much better. I don‚Äôt trust mamaearth any more.

review: Mamaearth products are made of 100%  natural ingredients which contain mulberry extract and vitamin C.MulBerry extract is used to treat hyperpigmentation and vitamin C heals in sun damage and repairs damaged skin cells.It suits all skin types .It is free from mineral oil and paraben.It reduces dark spots,blemishes and controls melanin.It has  a pump dispenser which is great for travelling. Can be used as a moisturiser.

name: Mamaearth-Blemishes-Pigmentation-Blemish-Mulberry
review: Hello everyone, Please buy this product only if you are looking for "Moisturizer" .This works as a great moisturizer and it does the job what it claims for but not 100%.Iam writing this review after 1 month of usage and realised that this is a product where 30ml  isn't available in original website of "Mamaearth , I  figured out only after purchasing 50 ml from original website of Mamaearth.Ingredients: If you compare the ingredients of 30ml and 50ml : 30ml contains all the chemicals and 50ml consists of all the essential oils which is great.Scent: 30ml bottle has great smell coz all the chemicals are added.50ml bottle has the smell of essential oils which most of them might not like it( Hardly any chemical is added)This I figured out after using the 30ml which I purchased from Amazon and I used it exactly for 1 month and bottle got over, then I was looking to buy another one and I went to Mamaearth original site and figured out this .I would recommend you to compare the ingredients before you buy this from Amazon

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: This face wash is amazing guys. I've oily skin. Every now and then my face breaks out. But when I first time used this within 4 wash my pimples were gone! I'm not jocking guys. name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: I have oily to combination skin. During Monsoons, my skin becomes even oilier due to humidity and also it becomes more prone to breakouts. I have been using this face wash for quite some time now and it works amazing on my skin. It extracts the excess oil from my skin and leaves it clean but not dehydrated. Also, I haven't faced any breakout on my face since I've started using it.

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml

Both the product were fail to cure my pimple or acneI don't know what kind of pimple attack it was. only two or three pimple used to occur after healing that again two or three. OMG finally i consulted to doctor.Both the product i purchased with recommandation of fit tuber on YouTube.If your face is free of pimples or acne then you can use these products by replacing chemical products. But if you're suffering from pimples or acne i dont know both the facewashes will work or not. Because everybody has their own skin and their own causes of occuring pimples or acnes.You can buy and try.

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: I have sensitive and acne prone skin. More than active acne i have scars on my face. This face wash shows visible results after 1 usage only. It is very gentle on skin, has a pleasant and mild fragrance. Does not rip off the natural oil from your face, leaves your face deeply cleansed and smooth after wash. It is complete value for money

review: Mamaearth is always best.  Every product of this brand is awesome.  I love all babies products by Mamaearth. Best part of this soap is SUITABLE FOR EVERY BABY'S DELICATE SKIN even you can try it for your newborns as well.  I'm using it for my baby since birth. Quality same as mentioned. name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: Update: horrible bathing that I have used so far... My 3 year old son developed hives after using the soap and more over it turned him dark... Fragrance too strong... It literally hits you.. Will never buy again...The bar is ok ok... Not so good as it claims.... I used on my kid and feel it doesn't cleanse well.  I have a dry skin... I used for myself on face and found that my skin is still dry after washing... So nothing great about the moisturising part and more over I don't feel fresh after washing my face with this bar... Its like I haven't washed my face.  So I really doubt if it cleanses ur skin.
cleaned_review: update horrible bathing used far year old son developed hives using soap turned dark fragrance strong literally hits never buy againthe bar ok ok good claims used kid feel doesnt cleanse well dry skin used face found skin still dry washing nothing great moisturising part dont feel fresh washing face bar like havent washed face really doubt cleanses ur skin

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: Although, it makes a very rich and creamy lather, it starts melting quickly if kept wet. I need to take it out of the bathroom and dry it for the next use as I want to save as much of it as possible because it's costlier than other brands. But, it does a far better job than other brands and it's organic. I'm happy to have this soap in my skincare regimen as an adult who has a very sensitive skin prone to irritation. The best thing about this soap is it doesn't leave any residue, which I'm surprised to see. Other brands leave a thin film which makes skin feel very slippery and smooth and I don't like that. I want my skin to feel naked, fresh and not stripped with moisture. Mamaearth soap as well as the mamaearth baby wash did an excellent job. :)
cleaned_review: although makes rich creamy lather starts melting quickly kept wet need take bathroom dry next use want save much possible costlier brands far better job brands organic im happy soap skincare regimen adult sensitive skin prone irritation best thing soap doesnt leave residue im surprised see brands leave thin film makes skin feel slippery smooth dont like want skin feel naked fresh stripped moisture mamaearth soap well mamaearth baby wash excellent job

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: Very bad product worth ZERO star. The entire soap turn into a pasty mass after one time use. Not worth buying this product as the second day onwards one has to scoop it with hand like a cream and apply on baby. Bad manufacturing process for this soap. Better they market it in the form of liquid body wash. Moreover, the soapy feel doesn't go from the body on few rinse. Worst than Teddy bar which has similar outcome, but better than this. Dermadew found to best on my trials to find a good soap for my baby.
cleaned_review: bad product worth zero star entire soap turn pasty mass one time use worth buying product second day onwards one scoop hand like cream apply baby bad manufacturing process soap better market form liquid body wash moreover soapy feel doesnt go body rinse worst teddy bar similar outcome better dermadew found best trials find good soap baby

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: I avoided the previous negative reviews for this item and trusted mama earth brand but I'm sharing this review after 2 weeks of use. On 1st day itself I got rashes on my skin but I ignored it. Later on my whole face got rashes and small boils. My skin became too dry and spotty. I used it with mama earth baby cream still my skin was drying out giving me many burns on face. I stopped using this item and continued my cetaphil cleansing lotion. I will never use mama earth's any product again. I threw away the soaps and moisturizer.
cleaned_review: avoided previous negative reviews item trusted mama earth brand im sharing review weeks use st day got rashes skin ignored later whole face got rashes small boils skin became dry spotty used mama earth baby cream still skin drying giving many burns face stopped using item continued cetaphil cleansing lotion never use mama earths product threw away soaps moisturizer

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: I really have started appreciating this brand as the product they made really works well and best part is they are made from safe ingredients. This baby soap is been enriched with goodness  goat milk, oatmeal, Shea butter and coconut based cleanser. The skin of my toddler feels so soft after bath. The shape of the soap is perfect for little one to hold as well. No tears formula of soap is working great. It is very gentle on the skin. The fragrance is so amazing. I highly recommend this moisturizing bath to all mommies and daddies. I specially recommend it for toddlers who are in phase where they want to be independent and bath by themselves.

name: Godrej-No-1-Bathing-Soap-Lime
review: Godrej No. 1 is one of those soaps that has been able to balance all the essential tick points in a common bath soap viz pleasant fragrance, good lather, soft on the skin (I use this during Delhi winters and while some soaps leads to skin drying, Godrej No. 1 leaves the skin soft and moisturized) and economical.I personally love the Lime fragrance but all the other ones are good too and it boils down to an individual preference. Irrespective of the fragrance it will not disappoint. Highly recommend.If you find this review useful then please press the "Helpful" button. Thanks.

name: Godrej-aer-Pocket-Bathroom-Fragrance
review: I've been using this Godrej aer pocket for a couple of years now. Yes I understand that the fragrance doesn't last for more than a week. It is very strong the first couple of days and rest of the times it is just a light hint of the scent. Then the gel eventually crystallizes.I figured out a way for a 'juggad'. Basically I never take the gel pack out of the plastic cover. There is a hole at the top to hang individual packs for store displays that I cut. Then with scissors, I carefully make 3 slender cuts. This makes the scent come out soft and not too powerful. It lasts for almost 20 days this way. The violet fragrance (purple) lasts for 25 days with this.Hope this review is helpful.
cleaned_review: ive using godrej aer pocket couple years yes understand fragrance doesnt last week strong first couple days rest times light hint scent gel eventually crystallizesi figured way juggad basically never take gel pack plastic cover hole top hang individual packs store displays cut scissors carefully make slender cuts makes scent come soft powerful lasts almost days way violet fragrance purple lasts days thishope review helpful

name: Godrej-aer-Pocket-Bathroom-Fragrance
review: These champs are better considering they are way to different from the Odonil fresheners we have been using for ages (it's basic law of diminishing returns) I'll encourage you to try them for their fragrance, and they are apt for any room in your apartment. When newly opened the fragrance is too strong that i would kick you in the face with it, but it dissolves when you give it a couple of days.Another good part about this is the concept of hanging it, I usually do in the fall ceiling of my washrooms, and it works pretty well.Word of caution: Don't expect it to last a month, because mine never have. Maximum 20 to 22 days, and then you'll want to replace it with a new one, but if you grab it on a deal on Amazon Pantry, it's quite economical
cleaned_review: champs better considering way different odonil fresheners using ages basic law diminishing returns ill encourage try fragrance apt room apartment newly opened fragrance strong would kick face dissolves give couple daysanother good part concept hanging usually fall ceiling washrooms works pretty wellword caution dont expect last month mine never maximum days youll want replace new one grab deal amazon pantry quite economical

review: Some of the packet looks like they have leaked and it is wet all over when you open the seal.  The fragrance does not last for 30 days.  It starts off with very strong smell and within a week it just fades.
cleaned_review: packet looks like leaked wet open seal fragrance last days starts strong smell within week fades

name: Godrej-aer-Pocket-Bathroom-Fragrance
review: The misty had kind of a soapy smell but works. Smell is pleasant but hardly you would know about the smell unless you get close to it. The citrus has a sort of tangy smell but i find it better than the misty. Will have to try the violet. Initial days your room will be filled with the pleasant smell but a packet  lasts only for like 14 days. In the latter days you will completely forget about it. If you have the shell to spend then go for it.
cleaned_review: misty kind soapy smell works smell pleasant hardly would know smell unless get close citrus sort tangy smell find better misty try violet initial days room filled pleasant smell packet lasts like days latter days completely forget shell spend go

name: Godrej-aer-Pocket-Bathroom-Fragrance
review: I've been using this Godrej aer pocket for a couple of years now. Yes I understand that the fragrance doesn't last for more than a week. It is very strong the first couple of days and rest of the times it is just a light hint of the scent. Then the gel eventually crystallizes.I figured out a way for a 'juggad'. Basically I never take the gel pack out of the plastic cover. There is a hole at the top to hang individual packs for store displays that I cut. Then with scissors, I carefully make 3 slender cuts. This makes the scent come out soft and not too powerful. It lasts for almost 20 days this way. The violet fragrance (purple) lasts for 25 days with this.Hope this review is helpful.
cleaned_review: ive using godrej aer pocket couple years yes understand fragrance doesnt last week strong first couple days rest times light hint scent gel eventually crystallizesi figured way juggad basically never take gel pack plastic cover hole top hang individual packs store displays cut scissors carefully make slender cuts makes scent come soft powerful lasts almost days way violet fragrance purple lasts days thishope review helpful

name: Godrej-aer-Pocket-Bathroom-Fragrance
review: These champs are better considering they are way to different from the Odonil fresheners we have been using for ages (it's basic law of diminishing returns) I'll encourage you to try them for their fragrance, and they are apt for any room in your apartment. When newly opened the fragrance is too strong that i would kick you in the face with it, but it dissolves when you give it a couple of days.Another good part about this is the concept of hanging it, I usually do in the fall ceiling of my washrooms, and it works pretty well.Word of caution: Don't expect it to last a month, because mine never have. Maximum 20 to 22 days, and then you'll want to replace it with a new one, but if you grab it on a deal on Amazon Pantry, it's quite economical

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: To start off, the safe arrived with a Low Battery message, meaning that before I could do anything else, I had to go and get new batteries for this brand new item. Once you get things in order, the safe works well and serves its purpose, however, the manual provided is obsolete, and the instructions do not match up with this product. There are no solutions posted online either. If you want to program the safe, you have to figure it out on your own. The customer service personnel were not helpful either and they kept trying to force me to get a technician to come to my house at the cost of Rs. 500 just to program the device, which completely defeats the purpose of online shopping. Don't fall for it. This is rather ridiculous for such a big brand like Godrej.In case anyone else needs to re-program their home code, here is what I was able to do. I hope it works for you too:1.) The instructions indicate to press 68#, but it actually means 68(Lock). If the instructions indicate *, try pressing Clear2.) Every time I pressed 68#, I got an error message, so I had to go through all the steps listed below.3.) Before you can change personal code in home mode, you will need to Access The Programming (pg. 6). The code is 751019 which means that there are 6 different features that you can program. Go through all the steps and change the numbers as they suit you. When you get to the last digit, there are no instructions written in the book, so you will have to figure this out on your own. If the last digit is 1, change it to 0 or 9.4.) After going through the programming and changing the last number, you should be able to go back to change the personal code in home mode.5.) If you set your password and it doesn't lock, go back to the programming again, and change the last digit back to what it was originally.Good luck.
cleaned_review: start safe arrived low battery message meaning could anything else go get new batteries brand new item get things order safe works well serves purpose however manual provided obsolete instructions match product solutions posted online either want program safe figure customer service personnel helpful either kept trying force get technician come house cost rs program device completely defeats purpose online shopping dont fall rather ridiculous big brand like godrejin case anyone else needs reprogram home code able hope works instructions indicate press actually means lock instructions indicate try pressing clear every time pressed got error message go steps listed change personal code home mode need access programming pg code means different features program go steps change numbers suit get last digit instructions written book figure last digit change going programming changing last number able go back change personal code home mode set password doesnt lock go back programming change last digit back originallygood luck

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: The product was good. But starting it for the first time took me several hours to start and install it properly.Here I will list out all steps so that reading this other people might find it helpful.1. Unwrap the package properly. Look for any damages.2. You will find a set of keys attached in a plastic sachet.3. Use the key to open the locker. There is a white cover near the button panel ,open it to insert keys.4. Inside the locker you will find the manual and wall mounting knots.5. The other side of the keypad panel will contain the battery space which needs 4 AA batteries for the led to start. But before inserting the batteries do see the positive & negative marked side and insert the batteries according to the charge respectively.6. Close the battery lid and led will automatically start working. The battery lid needs a small screw to get fixed. so if u don't find the screw in any plastic packets then use another aftermarket screws or maybe the screw is present inside the locker mechanism.7. The locker mechanism screws can be unlocked by a particular opener which will be given with the mounting knots inside the locker.8. The locker is now ready to use. Remove the keys and use the led to unlock and lock it. The default password is 1234.9. Please donot apply any pressure or try to press the firm bolts of the locker mechanism when the locker is open. Let the motor of the locker do its work.10. If the locker shows any other error message. Do consult the user manual.Note. Please be calm and do things properly or else you might damage the product.
cleaned_review: product good starting first time took several hours start install properlyhere list steps reading people might find helpful unwrap package properly look damages find set keys attached plastic sachet use key open locker white cover near button panel open insert keys inside locker find manual wall mounting knots side keypad panel contain battery space needs aa batteries led start inserting batteries see positive negative marked side insert batteries according charge respectively close battery lid led automatically start working battery lid needs small screw get fixed u dont find screw plastic packets use another aftermarket screws maybe screw present inside locker mechanism locker mechanism screws unlocked particular opener given mounting knots inside locker locker ready use remove keys use led unlock lock default password please donot apply pressure try press firm bolts locker mechanism locker open let motor locker work locker shows error message consult user manualnote please calm things properly else might damage product

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic

Good for small stuff. Light weight hence it needs to be mounted in cupboard or wall otherwise it is light enough to be carried and run ;-) Best thing is that I got it in a deal 4200.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: How to set new password in home mode , there is no # key as mentioned in manual. Idot seller and supplier.Double click clear button- enter 751019-enter 171310- press lock three times- enter new password -enter lock .done new password is setIt is good safe

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: I love this digital safe locker. Now I can put all my important stuff inside this box. The good thing is that it is not that bulky. The material is also very good, seems very strong and heavy. And, It is very easy to install. I have not mounted/fixed it because I put this inside the almera. Now I can feel safer by keeping cash, passport and other valuable stuff.Lookwise also it just has a classy touch. It has a proper colored LED display. It works on the battery power and the consumption is very low. You can set your own passcode from the 4-8 digits. I like it beep sound whenever you have to press the keys. In addition it also has 2 emergency keys. Overall now I am very calm ever since this digital safe has been arrived. Of course now I can manage my things for my own peace of mind according to my needs :-).Earlier I never ever used such kind of digital safe but after have been started using¬† this I found this as exactly as what I expected for. Truly it's a big value for money. I would highly recommend this product to everyone who read this review. Greets!*Please click the Helpful button if you like this review. Thank you!

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: I love this digital safe locker. Now I can put all my important stuff inside this box. The good thing is that it is not that bulky. The material is also very good, seems very strong and heavy. And, It is very easy to install. I have not mounted/fixed it because I put this inside the almera. Now I can feel safer by keeping cash, passport and other valuable stuff.Lookwise also it just has a classy touch. It has a proper colored LED display. It works on the battery power and the consumption is very low. You can set your own passcode from the 4-8 digits. I like it beep sound whenever you have to press the keys. In addition it also has 2 emergency keys. Overall now I am very calm ever since this digital safe has been arrived. Of course now I can manage my things for my own peace of mind according to my needs :-).Earlier I never ever used such kind of digital safe but after have been started using¬† this I found this as exactly as what I expected for. Truly it's a big value for money. I would highly recommend this product to everyone who read this review. Greets!*Please click the Helpful button if you like this review. Thank you!

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: To start off, the safe arrived with a Low Battery message, meaning that before I could do anything else, I had to go and get new batteries for this brand new item. Once you get things in order, the safe works well and serves its purpose, however, the manual provided is obsolete, and the instructions do not match up with this product. There are no solutions posted online either. If you want to program the safe, you have to figure it out on your own. The customer service personnel were not helpful either and they kept trying to force me to get a technician to come to my house at the cost of Rs. 500 just to program the device, which completely defeats the purpose of online shopping. Don't fall for it. This is rather ridiculous for such a big brand like Godrej.In case anyone else needs to re-program their home code, here is what I was able to do. I hope it works for you too:1.) The instructions indicate to press 68#, but it actually means 68(Lock). If the instructions indicate *, try pressing Clear2.) Every time I pressed 68#, I got an error message, so I had to go through all the steps listed below.3.) Before you can change personal code in home mode, you will need to Access The Programming (pg. 6). The code is 751019 which means that there are 6 different features that you can program. Go through all the steps and change the numbers as they suit you. When you get to the last digit, there are no instructions written in the book, so you will have to figure this out on your own. If the last digit is 1, change it to 0 or 9.4.) After going through the programming and changing the last number, you should be able to go back to change the personal code in home mode.5.) If you set your password and it doesn't lock, go back to the programming again, and change the last digit back to what it was originally.Good luck.
cleaned_review: start safe arrived low battery message meaning could anything else go get new batteries brand new item get things order safe works well serves purpose however manual provided obsolete instructions match product solutions posted online either want program safe figure customer service personnel helpful either kept trying force get technician come house cost rs program device completely defeats purpose online shopping dont fall rather ridiculous big brand like godrejin case anyone else needs reprogram home code able hope works instructions indicate press actually means lock instructions indicate try pressing clear every time pressed got error message go steps listed change personal code home mode need access programming pg code means different features program go steps change numbers suit get last digit instructions written book figure last digit change going programming changing last number able go back change personal code home mode set password doesnt lock go back programming change last digit back originallygood luck

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: The product was good. But starting it for the first time took me several hours to start and install it properly.Here I will list out all steps so that reading this other people might find it helpful.1. Unwrap the package properly. Look for any damages.2. You will find a set of keys attached in a plastic sachet.3. Use the key to open the locker. There is a white cover near the button panel ,open it to insert keys.4. Inside the locker you will find the manual and wall mounting knots.5. The other side of the keypad panel will contain the battery space which needs 4 AA batteries for the led to start. But before inserting the batteries do see the positive & negative marked side and insert the batteries according to the charge respectively.6. Close the battery lid and led will automatically start working. The battery lid needs a small screw to get fixed. so if u don't find the screw in any plastic packets then use another aftermarket screws or maybe the screw is present inside the locker mechanism.7. The locker mechanism screws can be unlocked by a particular opener which will be given with the mounting knots inside the locker.8. The locker is now ready to use. Remove the keys and use the led to unlock and lock it. The default password is 1234.9. Please donot apply any pressure or try to press the firm bolts of the locker mechanism when the locker is open. Let the motor of the locker do its work.10. If the locker shows any other error message. Do consult the user manual.Note. Please be calm and do things properly or else you might damage the product.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: The product is good. The only caveat (as I have noticed so far) is to be careful with the alarm. Don't keep stuff on it after switching the alarm on. Second, I think the alarm tone itself should change. It needs to be ALARMING. The volume needs to be a bit on the higher side as well. One can easily muffle the sound with a blanket type of fabric and make a getaway. That said, it is quite a sleek gadget. Definitely worth more than what one would be paying for. It's a bit heavy, but I guess that needs to be part of the "package" so to speak.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: This is very handy and useful. I keep it inside my wardrobe and store my wallet, car key and other loose currency and change in it when I come back from office. So no more  carelessly placed wallet risking small stealing by maid. As I got the wardrobe made recently, I got a specially designed compartment to keep this safe. It works flawlessly and is very easy to operate.  If I want to lock all the other wardrobes at home while going out somewhere, I keep the keys inside this.  no need to carry so many keys with me. One needs to know the purpose of this safe and the way to use it.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Using it since November 2016.Sleek and elegant. Sits nicely in my cupboard.Useful to keep certain small sized valuables like keys,cash,jewelry,certain documents,watches etc.The touch panel is great, feels soft and is responsive.Velvet lining is great.Portable.Only con I found is that it buzzez even if you close the cupboard door a bit hard.Other than that, Its good to have it.Note: Its not a regular heavy duty safe. Its more of a personal locker as mentioned. Don't expect it to be the most secure thing you can have.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Bought godrej goldilock in the Amazon diwali sale.. In The product that I got,was having some scratches already. Still I kept it.  I wanted to disable the theft alarm because it gives a loud sound even if we move the goldilock slightly, which is very annoying. I tried to disable the feature but it was not getting disabled. The godrej executive also couldn't do it.. He told some problem is there in pcb and I should return the product.. I did it.. I got the product replaced by Amazon the very next day...Now the new product also has same problem. We cannot disable the alarm. Also it has one additional problem...when we close its lid, it sometimes doesn't get locked. After 2-3 attempts, it gets locked..Now I am confused, what to do with this.. I trusted godrej brand and Amazon.. But the satisfaction level is not at all there

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Awesome packaging done by amazon !!Product review:Pros: 1.Easy to Carry  2.Touch screen is absolutely smooth.  3.Working mini safe with a primitive touch screen run by a 9 volt battery..well that is awesome.  4.Developers and Designers have done a great job in creating a sleek and stylish safe.Cons:  1.Although the safe looks great..not much space to place enough valuables.If u place a mobile,wallet and a wristwatch..space is done for.  2.Inner layer of the safe is made by a grossest material.It's so rough that it can scratch the back side of your iphone if haven't placed carefully.  3.Wiring for this safe can be done better.  4.Default battery provided to you will be a GP 9 volt alkaline battery,Mine was pretty much messySo to sum this up,a fine product for occasional use (routine if you are thrifty enough to spend bucks on batteries) with a stylish look ‚úåüèª

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: I recently gifted this item to my parents on their anniversary. However the product is good and easy to use with a very responsive touch panel , it has to be absolutely stationary else the alarm sets off which makes it difficult to carry during transportation.Also the Godrej support team is not quick in answering your queries and I received a product which had few scratches on it. So, Amazon should ensure that the product appears brand new since the customers are paying them for a brand new product.  Overall it's worth buying for your security needs.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Product Is Excellent but the packaging was really terrible, I was shocked to see the box damaged like it was thrown in the warehouse or something, luckily the product was in mint condition.The locker is very very useful when you have domestic help around, this locker shall actually keep you stress free, the locker is very easy to operate during day or night due to led backlit number which are illuminated, overall a great buy wish Amazon improves the packaging on this product in the future.....

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: If you have maids in the house and want to keep valuables like wallets and regular use small jewellery under lock and key while they go about their household chores and you don't want to carry physical keys either for fear of misplacing and searching for them or simply inconvenient for you, then this is the product to go for. It's small enough to sit on your study table or fit in your cupboard drawer..although you must understand That it can't fit more than 3 or 4 regular size men's wallets and some other knickknacks like ear rings, chains, cards etc. Easy to operate and install by reading instructions in manual. Sturdy enough to dissuade servants from physical tampering. Serves purpose for what it is intended to do.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: The product is good. The only caveat (as I have noticed so far) is to be careful with the alarm. Don't keep stuff on it after switching the alarm on. Second, I think the alarm tone itself should change. It needs to be ALARMING. The volume needs to be a bit on the higher side as well. One can easily muffle the sound with a blanket type of fabric and make a getaway. That said, it is quite a sleek gadget. Definitely worth more than what one would be paying for. It's a bit heavy, but I guess that needs to be part of the "package" so to speak.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: This is very handy and useful. I keep it inside my wardrobe and store my wallet, car key and other loose currency and change in it when I come back from office. So no more  carelessly placed wallet risking small stealing by maid. As I got the wardrobe made recently, I got a specially designed compartment to keep this safe. It works flawlessly and is very easy to operate.  If I want to lock all the other wardrobes at home while going out somewhere, I keep the keys inside this.  no need to carry so many keys with me. One needs to know the purpose of this safe and the way to use it.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Using it since November 2016.Sleek and elegant. Sits nicely in my cupboard.Useful to keep certain small sized valuables like keys,cash,jewelry,certain documents,watches etc.The touch panel is great, feels soft and is responsive.Velvet lining is great.Portable.Only con I found is that it buzzez even if you close the cupboard door a bit hard.Other than that, Its good to have it.Note: Its not a regular heavy duty safe. Its more of a personal locker as mentioned. Don't expect it to be the most secure thing you can have.

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Bought godrej goldilock in the Amazon diwali sale.. In The product that I got,was having some scratches already. Still I kept it.  I wanted to disable the theft alarm because it gives a loud sound even if we move the goldilock slightly, which is very annoying. I tried to disable the feature but it was not getting disabled. The godrej executive also couldn't do it.. He told some problem is there in pcb and I should return the product.. I did it.. I got the product replaced by Amazon the very next day...Now the new product also has same problem. We cannot disable the alarm. Also it has one additional problem...when we close its lid, it sometimes doesn't get locked. After 2-3 attempts, it gets locked..Now I am confused, what to do with this.. I trusted godrej brand and Amazon.. But the satisfaction level is not at all there

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Awesome packaging done by amazon !!Product review:Pros: 1.Easy to Carry  2.Touch screen is absolutely smooth.  3.Working mini safe with a primitive touch screen run by a 9 volt battery..well that is awesome.  4.Developers and Designers have done a great job in creating a sleek and stylish safe.Cons:  1.Although the safe looks great..not much space to place enough valuables.If u place a mobile,wallet and a wristwatch..space is done for.  2.Inner layer of the safe is made by a grossest material.It's so rough that it can scratch the back side of your iphone if haven't placed carefully.  3.Wiring for this safe can be done better.  4.Default battery provided to you will be a GP 9 volt alkaline battery,Mine was pretty much messySo to sum this up,a fine product for occasional use (routine if you are thrifty enough to spend bucks on batteries) with a stylish look ‚úåüèª

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: I recently gifted this item to my parents on their anniversary. However the product is good and easy to use with a very responsive touch panel , it has to be absolutely stationary else the alarm sets off which makes it difficult to carry during transportation.Also the Godrej support team is not quick in answering your queries and I received a product which had few scratches on it. name: Titan-Karishma-Analog-Blue-Watch-1774SM01
review: The watch looks superb. Excellent finish. You get exactly what you see in the photos. Product rating is 5 star.BUT i dont think the seller , Cloudtail , handled the product properly. When i opened the box, to my disappointment i found the thin plastic that covers a new watch glass face is all crumpled up to a corner. I was scared thinking the glass face must be damaged, but thank God it wasnt the case. Also there's no dealer stamp in the warranty card.My take: if you really like what you see, go for it. And if you are scared to buy online then buy it from the brick mortar shops, cause its worth it.

name: Titan-Karishma-Analog-Black-Watch-NK1639SM02
review: Got it to gift a groom at his wedding. Beautiful timepiece. In fact I loved it do much I'm getting one for myself. The black dial and the silver hands and silver marking makes the functioning of the watch look stunning and royal. Dial size is just right. It is definitely not small and it is not very big either. It looks very well balanced on the wrist. And the metal bracelet that comes with it is beautiful and goes perfectly with the timepiece dimension wise and there's no mismatch between them. Go for it without any second guessing. You'll love it ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you Amazon and thank you Titan. Both amazing companies and now you both have a very very happy and loyal customer in me for life.

review: you should not label a product as "Natural Juice" if it is a mixture of some juice with water and sugar and other flavorings including artificial flavors.  It doesn't taste badly but for anyone who bought it thinking it was going to be a liter of Natural Mango Juice, it is a very disappointing experience.  Why not be honest??

name: Natural-Mango-Juice-1L-Pack
review: I have bought this item a few times from Amazon. This morning however, I ordered it from Amazon Fresh and was shocked to be delivered a carton that was soaked in rat urine and stinking. You can see from the picture how terrible it looked. The juiceboxes inside weren't damaged but the stench of leptospirotic urine is unbearable and other packaged foods were in the same grocery bag!Amazon Fresh items cannot be returned or replaced, unfortunately, so I am stuck with this. Have to discard the juice boxes.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: Tried this paneer for the first time apprehensively. Surprisingly it's good in terms of texture and quality. Soft enough and decent portion size. Economical given home made Paneer during quarantine is an expensive affair as milk prices are exorbitant.Made some amazing gravy with same. Will definitely order again.Came hygienically packed in a vacuum bag and has a 45day validity. By processed food standards it is excellent not chewy or smelly like most dairy brands but then again it's an Amul product can't go wrong really.Thanks Amazon fresh for the prompt delivery.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: During this indefinite lockdown this paneer has definitely been a saviour.The best part is that the expiry date is almost 45 days. This helps to stock and store paneer and use it as and when need be which actually is not possible with any fresh dairy paneer. It is not very soft like your fresh paneer but still it tastes good enough.I have made tandoori and chinese recipes using this block of paneer and i keep reordering too.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's DARK AND BITTER, so if you're one of those sweet suger filled fake chocolate lovers, than this is out of your league, stick to your sugar candies.It's extremely hard to find anything this dark in India and even if there are, they're extremely pricy cause of low quantity production. Thanks to AMUL, now we have true dark chocolate at affordable price.NB: Loving the texture and feel of the chocolate. I'm really happy.Update: Finished 4 packs in less than 13 days. Ordered another 4. I just love the texture of the chocolate in my mouth. Truly in love ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's literally heavenly feeling to taste this chocolate. The chocolate is bitter to the core. It has no added suger. Sugery chocolate/fake chocolate lovers won't like it. It's for those people who has developed taste for cocoa/cacao over the period of time. It's made for chocolate connoisseur. Price is very less when compare to other brands in market. Plus Amul is well-known brand itself. Packaging was nice.
cleaned_review: literally heavenly feeling taste chocolate chocolate bitter core added suger sugery chocolatefake chocolate lovers wont like people developed taste cocoacacao period time made chocolate connoisseur price less compare brands market plus amul wellknown brand packaging nice

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: I simply love this pure cocoa taste....not sure if people consider this bitter, I personally do not feel so, may be very mildly. But the cocoa taste, flavor indeed feels great.I had earlier tasted upto 90% dark among the Amul chocolates (& of course couple of other makes including Lindt). In fact I have graduated in darkness with Amul's progression in a way starting at 55% then 75, 90 and now 99% - in fact love the whole range by Amul. As long as this range is available I will never have to look beyond for Dark chocolates. Thanks Amul. In fact on an earlier occasion I had purchased 99% dark of some other make and did not like the flavor at all - strangely it had kind of a sourish smell and so far a bit hesitant with this item as well at first.Another thing the chocolates were delivered superbly packaged - thanks to the seller. Had a carton box outside and inside of it the chocolate packs had a layer of some kind of gel filled plastic bags to keep the chocolates at non melting temperature....pretty cool - so no melting problem or anything for me.So this would be my daily dose of dark chocolate from now on like a cube (or sometimes two) after each meal - enjoyable in taste, and so sugar, no guilt!!
cleaned_review: simply love pure cocoa tastenot sure people consider bitter personally feel may mildly cocoa taste flavor indeed feels greati earlier tasted upto dark among amul chocolates course couple makes including lindt fact graduated darkness amuls progression way starting fact love whole range amul long range available never look beyond dark chocolates thanks amul fact earlier occasion purchased dark make like flavor strangely kind sourish smell far bit hesitant item well firstanother thing chocolates delivered superbly packaged thanks seller carton box outside inside chocolate packs layer kind gel filled plastic bags keep chocolates non melting temperaturepretty cool melting problem anything meso would daily dose dark chocolate like cube sometimes two meal enjoyable taste sugar guilt

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: So basically, this is not the chocolate for everyone. At first when I tasted it, I badly regretted buying it. It tasted nowhere near the chocolate you would find in the market. There isn't even the slightest hint of any kind of sweetness in it and most people would find it gross. But the more I ate it, the more I could feel it's richness and realised how decadent it is. It's not a chocolate, it's THE chocolate.
cleaned_review: basically chocolate everyone first tasted badly regretted buying tasted nowhere near chocolate would find market isnt even slightest hint kind sweetness people would find gross ate could feel richness realised decadent chocolate chocolate

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Amul 99% cacao is the best dark/bitter chocolate available in India... excellent innovation by Amul. I may tell that I am not endorsing Amul or any other brand...just my own opinions. It has been proven that cacao is one of the healthiest superfoods on earth with amazing health benefits. It's full of antioxidants & flavonoids which increase lifespan. It's one of the highest sources of nitric oxide which dilates/widens & relaxes blood vessels of the body by reducing blockages, thereby supporting heart & brain health. Cacao is also anti inflammatory and anti carcinogenic, thus reduces cancer risk. Moreover, cacao is a natural blood thinner, so can prevent blood clots, reduce blood cholesterol & blood sugar and lower blood pressure. Overall Amul dark cacao chocolate has enormous health benefits...so we must be thankful to Amul for making such an awesome health food. Please ignore the negative and one star rated reviews as those people are ignorant and lack awareness. Requesting all the sugar lovers...please don't defame such a nice and healthy product by giving negative ratings and one star. I pity those innocent sweet toothed people which focus on tongue taste rather than general health. Again, I am not promoting Amul company or a representative of the same, these are my personal views & experience. Those who want to enhance quality of life and reduce onset of lifestyle/genetic diseases like cancer, diabetes, hypertension, stroke, heart attacks, cardiac arrest, etc must not think twice...just purchase the stuff & enjoy. Infact, Amul 99% Cacao Chocolate is a heavenly bliss with irresistible taste. It is indeed Delightful & Ambrosial. I am giving a five star rating to this authentic product...if there were 10 stars, I would have given full 10/10. Lastly, thanks to Amul & Amazon, too for providing such a nice superfood at my doorstep.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: I simply love this pure cocoa taste....not sure if people consider this bitter, I personally do not feel so, may be very mildly. But the cocoa taste, flavor indeed feels great.I had earlier tasted upto 90% dark among the Amul chocolates (& of course couple of other makes including Lindt). In fact I have graduated in darkness with Amul's progression in a way starting at 55% then 75, 90 and now 99% - in fact love the whole range by Amul. As long as this range is available I will never have to look beyond for Dark chocolates. Thanks Amul. In fact on an earlier occasion I had purchased 99% dark of some other make and did not like the flavor at all - strangely it had kind of a sourish smell and so far a bit hesitant with this item as well at first.Another thing the chocolates were delivered superbly packaged - thanks to the seller. Had a carton box outside and inside of it the chocolate packs had a layer of some kind of gel filled plastic bags to keep the chocolates at non melting temperature....pretty cool - so no melting problem or anything for me.So this would be my daily dose of dark chocolate from now on like a cube (or sometimes two) after each meal - enjoyable in taste, and so sugar, no guilt!!

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Amul 99% cacao is the best dark/bitter chocolate available in India... excellent innovation by Amul. I may tell that I am not endorsing Amul or any other brand...just my own opinions. It has been proven that cacao is one of the healthiest superfoods on earth with amazing health benefits. It's full of antioxidants & flavonoids which increase lifespan. It's one of the highest sources of nitric oxide which dilates/widens & relaxes blood vessels of the body by reducing blockages, thereby supporting heart & brain health. Cacao is also anti inflammatory and anti carcinogenic, thus reduces cancer risk. Moreover, cacao is a natural blood thinner, so can prevent blood clots, reduce blood cholesterol & blood sugar and lower blood pressure. Overall Amul dark cacao chocolate has enormous health benefits...so we must be thankful to Amul for making such an awesome health food. Please ignore the negative and one star rated reviews as those people are ignorant and lack awareness. Requesting all the sugar lovers...please don't defame such a nice and healthy product by giving negative ratings and one star. I pity those innocent sweet toothed people which focus on tongue taste rather than general health. Again, I am not promoting Amul company or a representative of the same, these are my personal views & experience. Those who want to enhance quality of life and reduce onset of lifestyle/genetic diseases like cancer, diabetes, hypertension, stroke, heart attacks, cardiac arrest, etc must not think twice...just purchase the stuff & enjoy. Infact, Amul 99% Cacao Chocolate is a heavenly bliss with irresistible taste. It is indeed Delightful & Ambrosial. I am giving a five star rating to this authentic product...if there were 10 stars, I would have given full 10/10. Lastly, thanks to Amul & Amazon, too for providing such a nice superfood at my doorstep.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: Hi All,As I cut opened the pack I was really amazed by the ghee quality. We usually assume patanjali products to be  low/poor quality since it is manufactured indigenously or may be because we are already habitual of using Costly products. You may find the price hike too much of this Ghee, I can assure you it is because the quality is really authentic. I do not have the images of the ghee now. Ghee is thick, pale white in color. And taste so Delicious. The aroma is so authentic.It has long shelf life. However, I have recently started making Full cream cow milk ghee at home.Will definitely recommend everyone to try this Ghee.

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: This product from patanjali can be a nightmare for your skin. Although the fragrance is good and it is a cheap product but that's all. I have normal skin and am not very prone to pimples. But after applying this gel for a couple of days, I started having pimples on my face. First I ignored, thinking it could be a result of the weather. But then the pimples started increasing. I immediately discontinued the product. But still I am unable to get rid of the pimples.
cleaned_review: product patanjali nightmare skin although fragrance good cheap product thats normal skin prone pimples applying gel couple days started pimples face first ignored thinking could result weather pimples started increasing immediately discontinued product still unable get rid pimples

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: I use this gel as my night cream and I am quite happy with it. It doesn't make me a beauty queen overnight, but moisturizes my skin the non-intrusive way, and thats what I need. The impact is for a short time, as it would 'naturally' be. Its a good replenishment especially in summers.Only thing I think they can improve is change the packaging and use a bit high quality one. The cap is quite sharp to open and close. This can hurt if not operated carefully. Secondly, its a tube. You usually, habitually, keep the tube inverted with cap down to take out the gel. When you open with cap down, the hard cap and not so thick gel work in conjunction and it opens with a jerk, throwing some of gel around, wasting as well as messing things around at times. I now, open the cap with cap on top and then invert the tube to take it out. I learnt after some messes. This is too much to be careful about and Patanjali sure needs to work on the packaging front of this gel.
cleaned_review: use gel night cream quite happy doesnt make beauty queen overnight moisturizes skin nonintrusive way thats need impact short time would naturally good replenishment especially summersonly thing think improve change packaging use bit high quality one cap quite sharp open close hurt operated carefully secondly tube usually habitually keep tube inverted cap take gel open cap hard cap thick gel work conjunction opens jerk throwing gel around wasting well messing things around times open cap cap top invert tube take learnt messes much careful patanjali sure needs work packaging front gel

When you open with cap down, the hard cap and not so thick gel work in conjunction and it opens with a jerk, throwing some of gel around, wasting as well as messing things around at times. I now, open the cap with cap on top and then invert the tube to take it out. I learnt after some messes. This is too much to be careful about and Patanjali sure needs to work on the packaging front of this gel.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: Dettol is no doubt a good brand for disinfectant liquids. As compare to dettol original, this Lime fragrance gives a fresh feel after using. Can use for floors, kitchen tiles, bathroom, laundry & shaving purpose. I use this disinfectant liquid with water in this COVID-19 pandemic to wash products and spray on doors, door bell, all surfaces etc. We can use this for bathing purpose also. It is multi-purpose cleaner is safe on skin and on all surfaces. Nice way to disinfect your home.

I am very much pleased after using this variety and will buy this again in future.

I use this disinfectant liquid with water in this COVID-19 pandemic to wash products and spray on doors, door bell, all surfaces etc. We can use this for bathing purpose also. It is multi-purpose cleaner is safe on skin and on all surfaces. Nice way to disinfect your home.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: I have never purchased this variety before. I have always used dettol antiseptic liquid. But during lock-down it was vanished from local medicine stores. So I moved online, it was even difficult to get one there also. However, after lots of attempt I got 1. After using this for shaving purpose I think it is equally good as antiseptic variety. It leaves a freshness felling after washing face with this. This leaves a refreshing fragrance if mixed with bathing water. I am very much pleased after using this variety and will buy this again in future.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: As Civilisation came to a stick end, the remaining Survivors fought over the last piece of the famed Antiseptic, claimed to be effective against all manners of Germs that covered the world. Finally, only a handful remained to satiate the desire of those who would be quick enough to steal these. Was it then worth it, for one man, to serve his own self, to grab the last Dettol? Over those that truely needed it, like healers of the sick people, or seek the ire of hoarders, who wanted the Last Dettol at any cost? The answer is yes, for not only this Dettol is effective as an Antiseptic, but also smells nice.

review: You might think you would buy a refill instead of a new bottle to save money or even reduce plastic use.However do not buy this refill. It is not the original dettol handwash.As soon as i refilled bottle and started using i noticed first color is lighter. Noticeably lighter. I have used handwash for a long time it has never happened to me.I wouldn't even risk givin this pack away to someone for free because it is awful. So it will end up in dustbin.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: I have two small kids at home and they are continuously falling ill these days. So, I bought Dettol disinfected spray last week and very much satisfied with it. It has a very nice and mild scented fragrance. I tried it inside my car, washroom and kids room as well. It leaves the place very fresh and nice.Although, there is no way to check whether it kills the germs or not but still I think it worth to try once. name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Dettol Surface Disinfectant Spray is good  for killing germs. But few points are worth noting.1. New spray bottle comes with a cap, whereas old bottle comes without cap, which is discontinued by dettol.2. Most of the material inside is gas, very less quantity of alcohol.3. Dettol is widely used by people inspite of the fact that it comes with 60% alcohol, whereas other brands like savlon comes with 62% alcohol.5. Fragrance is strong.6. Cap is not properly fitted and comes off very easily.

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Much needed product during this pandemic

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Was waiting for a long long time to get my hands on this post pandemic. It's still very difficult to find in local stores or any other online shops and finally it's now available on Amazon.Extreme useful and versatile liquid to have at home which can be used for first aids, bathing, shaving, disinfecting clothes or even for floor cleaning. Do dilute the liquid as per the instructions mentioned on the product label.It contains Chlorhexidine Gluconate Solution I. P. 1.5% v/v and strong Cetrimide Solution B.P. equivalent to Cetrimide I.P. 3.0% w/v to provide antiseptic and disinfectant properties. This duo not only more effective than Dettol's (Original Brown liquid) Chloroxylenol but also doesn't sting after applying on skin.There's also now a Multipurpose Disinfectant cleaner from Savlon to compete against Dettol's Multipurpose Liquid (Green, Blue bottle) which is more suitable as disinfectant if you want nice fragrance but also a lot more expensive  https://www.amazon.in/dp/B08CL5P72J/, stick to this Original Savlon if you don't want much fragrance.
cleaned_review: waiting long long time get hands post pandemic still difficult find local stores online shops finally available amazonextreme useful versatile liquid home used first aids bathing shaving disinfecting clothes even floor cleaning dilute liquid per instructions mentioned product labelit contains chlorhexidine gluconate solution p vv strong cetrimide solution bp equivalent cetrimide ip wv provide antiseptic disinfectant properties duo effective dettols original brown liquid chloroxylenol also doesnt sting applying skintheres also multipurpose disinfectant cleaner savlon compete dettols multipurpose liquid green blue bottle suitable disinfectant want nice fragrance also lot expensive httpswwwamazonindpbclpj stick original savlon dont want much fragrance

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: I gave this a try as dettol antiseptic was not available. Not sure about effectiveness. But unlike dettol, water turns orange in colour upon using savlon and cant be used for laundry especially for white clothes. It doesnt stain clothes but gives a very mild peachy tint. Coming to scent, i read some reviews where it was mentioned that smell is better than dettol. But i  dont feel the difference.  In fact i prefer dettol smell, may be because we were using it since long..

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Very effective. Active ingredients are  quaternary ammonium chloride compounds which are a very potent and effective disinfectant - you can find these in most non-bleach disinfectant solutions. This is not the same as Dettol antiseptic used for skin so do not use it for that purpose. I am glad that Dettol introduced this as it was difficult to find purpose-made disinfectant concentrates of this formulation - the alternative was Amway Pursue which is not only much more expensive but would involve the hassle of dealing with a pushy Amway salesperson. Anyways, this one has a strong menthol smell and a highly effective disinfectant so fantastic for household use. Also works for laundry, but use it as a pre-wash, with a full wash cycle afterwards to clean out any residues.Also, a word of caution with this and any other disinfectants - please use it wisely and not indiscriminately as overuse not only can damage the environment but kill of beneficial microorganisms and cause harmful ones to develop resistance.
cleaned_review: effective active ingredients quaternary ammonium chloride compounds potent effective disinfectant find nonbleach disinfectant solutions dettol antiseptic used skin use purpose glad dettol introduced difficult find purposemade disinfectant concentrates formulation alternative amway pursue much expensive would involve hassle dealing pushy amway salesperson anyways one strong menthol smell highly effective disinfectant fantastic household use also works laundry use prewash full wash cycle afterwards clean residuesalso word caution disinfectants please use wisely indiscriminately overuse damage environment kill beneficial microorganisms cause harmful ones develop resistance

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: This is one of the best disinfectant I have ever used. It has a strong menthol smell which I just love. This is a multipurpose liquid ,which can be used to clean laundry, wipe the floor, used while shaving to cleanse the razor, kitchen and bathroom cleaning, can be added to bathing water while taking a bath (those who don't mind menthol smell). Mind you, this is not the good old detail antiseptic liquid which comes with the clear bottle and green cap,which  is handy for cuts and wounds. This is an disinfectant liquid used for household cleaning. I use this in the washing machine along with the normal liquid detergent and let me tell you,my clothes smell amazing after wash.  I would recommend you all to try this if you like strong menthol smell. I just love it.. 5 stars for the product.
cleaned_review: one best disinfectant ever used strong menthol smell love multipurpose liquid used clean laundry wipe floor used shaving cleanse razor kitchen bathroom cleaning added bathing water taking bath dont mind menthol smell mind good old detail antiseptic liquid comes clear bottle green capwhich handy cuts wounds disinfectant liquid used household cleaning use washing machine along normal liquid detergent let tell youmy clothes smell amazing wash would recommend try like strong menthol smell love stars product

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: I really had liked the packing of this soap. But more than that, I remember as soon as I had unpacked it, the surprising fresh smell coming from it was amazing.The soap foam feels soft, rich and white. It moisturizes the skin perfectly. I have an oily skin so I wanted a soap which can balance the skin moisture, not over moisturizing not drying out the skin. And this soap pretty much does that.Also, it lasts for a good time, also most soaps give up their foaming capability as soon as they become small, but this one still gives great lather. Would recommend to everyone.
cleaned_review: really liked packing soap remember soon unpacked surprising fresh smell coming amazingthe soap foam feels soft rich white moisturizes skin perfectly oily skin wanted soap balance skin moisture moisturizing drying skin soap pretty much thatalso lasts good time also soaps give foaming capability soon become small one still gives great lather would recommend everyone

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Nice smelling scented bath soap from Cinthol. The scent lingers for a while even after washing off and leaves the bathroom also smelling great. Besides that it does its job of cleaning as it should. So full points there. Only thing is I was somewhat misguided and ordered a smaller pack when I needed a larger one.
cleaned_review: nice smelling scented bath soap cinthol scent lingers even washing leaves bathroom also smelling great besides job cleaning full points thing somewhat misguided ordered smaller pack needed larger one

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: What a gem from an old and trusted Indian brand. And such great value for money.The fragrance is nice powdery scent which is refreshing without being overpowering. The soap‚Äôs cleansing is good, not great. But it has a nice creaminess which is far beyond its modest price. In fact, it has a nice natural creaminess, and not the slipperiness of a Dove. Also, it seems to long last. A clear winner and will be a regular feature on my bathing rack.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: After blindly using this soap for *years* it suddenly struck me that there is zero cooling effect in this soap now and by now I mean 2-3 years.I started using cinthol cool 6-7 years ago as a kid when I used to think how awesome is this soap (with that tingling cooling after sensation) I felt that this soap is way underrated because of that and the signature smell of it. But now I have realised that the cooling part is ZERO. And the fragrance is bland and doesn't last long.Either this soap is fake because I've been continuously ordering this soap online in saver pack of 4/5 soaps from Amazon (but the seller being a trusty one at that ü§î) or Godrej has changed the chemical composition of this soap.Either Godrej should bring a "stronger" version of cinthol cool soap or I should look for better alternatives because this soap isn't what it used to be once.
cleaned_review: blindly using soap years suddenly struck zero cooling effect soap mean yearsi started using cinthol cool years ago kid used think awesome soap tingling cooling sensation felt soap way underrated signature smell realised cooling part zero fragrance bland doesnt last longeither soap fake ive continuously ordering soap online saver pack soaps amazon seller trusty one godrej changed chemical composition soapeither godrej bring stronger version cinthol cool soap look better alternatives soap isnt used

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: I bought this product because I was experiencing some bad prickly heat and thought the menthol would help. Although I don't feel the 'minty' feeling I was hoping for, I am still well pleased. The scent is very nice and refreshing but not over-bearing like it should only be used by MALES, not medicinal smelling. I don't feel as though my skin is dry and cracking off. And the prickly heat symptoms are gone. I like this product, I will be suggesting it to my friends and family.
cleaned_review: bought product experiencing bad prickly heat thought menthol would help although dont feel minty feeling hoping still well pleased scent nice refreshing overbearing like used males medicinal smelling dont feel though skin dry cracking prickly heat symptoms gone like product suggesting friends family

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: This is not the same product as advertised. I received a Steax Vitariche gloss serum instead of Streax pro Vitagloss as the product name suggests. Called CS to get the refund and since i had closed my bank account since the order was placed i wanted the refund to come through amazon pay. However Amazon rep Aniket and the supervisor Krishna were absolutely unhelpful and went against common sense to keep telling me that the refund will only be processed to the closed bank account and the bank will issue me a DD. When i called them out on their lack of common sense they kept repeating themselves. Finally decided to give away the product than to deal with Amazon for a refund. This shows how base Amazon‚Äôs customer service is and a good sign for all to avoid using Amazon if you value your money and time.
cleaned_review: product advertised received steax vitariche gloss serum instead streax pro vitagloss product name suggests called cs get refund since closed bank account since order placed wanted refund come amazon pay however amazon rep aniket supervisor krishna absolutely unhelpful went common sense keep telling refund processed closed bank account bank issue dd called lack common sense kept repeating finally decided give away product deal amazon refund shows base amazons customer service good sign avoid using amazon value money time

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: Minimal effort required to tame frizzy hair with this serum. Hair has nice shiny smooth look and soft to touch. Pleasant scent. Has same good effect on damp hair as well as completely dried hair. Overall 'thumbs up' for this product.
cleaned_review: minimal effort required tame frizzy hair serum hair nice shiny smooth look soft touch pleasant scent good effect damp hair well completely dried hair overall thumbs product

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: I've used this serum on my normal hair and chemically straightened hair, as well as seen results on colored hair. And honestly at this price, it never disappointed me. Though the texture is quite thin compared to a lot of other hair serums, but I like how it does not feel heavy on my hair and just a pump of it is enough to dab on my medium length hair. This does the basic job of a hair serum from detangling to providing moisture to the ends of the hair and since it goes a long way, so thumbs up from my side. And to my surprise, the new variant - vitariche gloss is way better than the previous one and this comes with nutty fragrance, which I totally love!
cleaned_review: ive used serum normal hair chemically straightened hair well seen results colored hair honestly price never disappointed though texture quite thin compared lot hair serums like feel heavy hair pump enough dab medium length hair basic job hair serum detangling providing moisture ends hair since goes long way thumbs side surprise new variant vitariche gloss way better previous one comes nutty fragrance totally love
