name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Someone like me had always fancied upon getting some of my hair getting coloured when I see some people with colored or highlighted hair.Going to parlor or salon has always been hard on budget if you are living in a working middle class family.Finally I decided to get 2 packets of this hair highlighter after doing some research and surfing various Youtube videos.Coming to this product let me review as under:Pros:1  Gives good color/highlights if kept for about 45 minutes. (note: 30 minutes is not enough if you have dark black hair).2 The color stays for about 8-9 months and lightens with time.3 After about 1-1.5 months of applying this hair color, I would suggest to use henna/mehendi for about 1 hour in all you hairs...which will not only nourish your hair, but also give very good result for highlighted hairs.4 Personal tip- If you are not satisfied with colored/highlighted hair and want to remove it, use anti-dandruff shampoo 3-4 times while washing your hair. Also the Godrej hair dye (black) available in powder sachet is also effective in removing the highlights.Cons:1 One sachet is not enough even for short hair. Purchase 2 sachets if you want proper results. (note: if you are a girl with shoulder length hair or more, I would suggest 3 sachets).2 Does not give too much highlighted effect if you want to get noticed from others with normal hair.3 Just like any other chemical hair color, it damages you hair and makes your hair rough.Verdict:It is ok to give this a try once if you want to color/highlight your hair at home. I would rather suggest spending few bucks and get your hair highlighted in parlor or salon for better results.If you find my review helpful, please click the YES/HELPFUL button! üëç

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Its a nightmare!!!!!!Trust me, I stuck to each and every direction written on the leaflet, and after almost 2 hours of blonder-shampoo-color-shampoo routine, my entire hair turned orange!!!! That too, not a funky orange. Just the badly-done-henna orange, if you know what I mean.I have tried blue and green and blonde hair color previously, semi+permanent and permanent, but never did I think that a safe color like cappucino brown will turn out to be such a disaster!!!!!!!!Had to order another color just to cover this mess up. Frantically searching for scarfs andhats right now.

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: The blue came out great! I have dark brown hair and bleached it twice (with volume 30 developer) before applying the colour. Left the colour on for 45-60 minutes. My hair (which felt very rough after bleaching) became much softer after rinsing off the colour. I also used the Crazy Violet (can see it in the pic). Have previously used Manic Panic hair colour which is 4 times the price, and a lot less effective. Would definitely recommend this range from Streax :D
cleaned_review: blue came great dark brown hair bleached twice volume developer applying colour left colour minutes hair felt rough bleaching became much softer rinsing colour also used crazy violet see pic previously used manic panic hair colour times price lot less effective would definitely recommend range streax

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Came out a beautiful colour on my level 9 hair even though I diluted it with conditioner to increase the quantity. Would've been stunning if I didn't have to do that! Try to increase the time between washes as you can noticeably see it fade after every wash. Give your hair a blast of cold water after showering to lock the cuticle or the colour will bleed over your neck, clothes, everywhere until it dries.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I have curly hair and am recovering from heat damage hence went natural about 3 months ago. Needed CG friendly shampoo and this one does the job.The consistency is thick like any other shampoo and it is a clear liquid. Since it is a baby shampoo, if you are an adult you may require a good 10 ml shampoo for one time use.Given the price it is worth it.  Leaves hair and scalp feeling clean.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Great shampoo! Sulfate free, mild, soothing fragrance. Make sure you take a lot more than you usually do for it to feel sufficient. Also, rub your palms together to create a soft lather and then rub on to scalp/hair. This is important. Really useful to those with curly hair. Gentle enough for your little one.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I bought 100ml pack at local shop to try it and I loved the fragrance and it leaves my baby hair smooth with a lovely lingering smell. So I ordered a 400ml pack at Amazon @Rs.168.The one I bought at local store is very thick,with almost gel like consistency, doesn't even spill out even if the cap is open and lying down,have to really squeeze it out. But the one I bought from Amazon is so watery and runny. Spills out in an instant without even squeezing bottle.There is no seal on bottle so there's no telling if the content is genuine or tampered with,maybe diluted, who knows.

Even though this is a baby lotion people with very sensitive skin can also use this one as it is good for damaged skin too. After using for many months i can say it rebuilds your skin.Himalaya is now not using Paraben for Baby lotion so the lotion is safe than before. This lotion is not greesy at all. Please go for Original product as duplicates are out there.

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: I've ordered it 3 times and likely to order again. Unlike the 400ml Himalaya gentle baby shampoo or gentle baby bath which has no seals, this lotion comes in clear laminated sealed pack and I've received it in good condition and packing all the 3 times I ordered. Although it's tad light it's okay for baby skin. I love it's fragrance, leaves my baby smelling nice and I use it myself too but it's too light for my dry skin,but of course it's meant mainly for babies.One winning feature about this particular 400ml pack is it's pump feature,makes it lot easier to literally use it singlehandedly which comes in real handy if you've to hold a squirming wriggling baby with your other hand!Update : I've ordered my 9th bottle! Initially seller give one bottle but nowadays the minimum quantity is 2 bottles. But it's okay,your baby is going to use it every day and they come with very good shelf life so you finish them long before it's expiry date.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I was using Himalaya moisturized 8 years back and my skin was really good, soft and gentle. After I moved to Hyderabad I moved to different products like Olay, Ponds, Lotus, Maybelline, Lakme etc. I wasn't happy with any of them. but this Anti aging cream is awesome, in a weeks time I can see and feel the difference in my skin, its very light and light smell. Totally like this cream.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I have ordered this product for my Mom. And she is very happy with the results after using this product.It does works nicely to reduce your wrinkles if you will apply it on daily bases.At least use this twice in a day, if you really want to improve your skin tone.What I liked the most about this product:#####################################üëåIts fragrance is good.üëåMade up with natural ingredients, So it won't harm to your skin.üëåComes with a very cheaper price if we will  compare to other related brands.üëåJUST go for this product if you are suffering from wrinkle problem.####################################GO for it.Its a value for money product under budget.ü§ó

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I got this for my mom because of the reviews and, to be honest, because of its low price. My mom has been applying it with great dedication every night for over 2 months now (had it ordered 2 times). I can‚Äôt say I have seen much of a difference. The least a cream can do is moisturize, but this cream doesn‚Äôt work as a moisturizer either. Again, I might be wrong and because my mom has just started using aging creams while she should have started at least some 10 years ago. But, I would really recommend going with better options. And people in the same predicament as mine, can you please suggest me creams that might work?
cleaned_review: got mom reviews honest low price mom applying great dedication every night months ordered times cant say seen much difference least cream moisturize cream doesnt work moisturizer either might wrong mom started using aging creams started least years ago would really recommend going better options people predicament mine please suggest creams might work

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: I'm a milk-tea addicted person. Although, I control it upto thrice day but sometimes it may exceed 5.Since I like milk-tea alot, I have tried many Dust-teas available in the market.I've tried and tasted Wagh-bakri, brookebond, Taj, society, maharsthra chai, maa-beti Chai & you name it.I liked the society tea alot. This tea when boiled in the water gives a nice flavor and the color which no other teas can give.The packaging was nice. I ordered for a 1kg pack directly since I already knew about the taste.From the value for money standpoint, it is a little costlier (20-30 Rs per kg)  in comparison to its other teas of its class. But you will find it worth it. Just make sure you use a correct method to prepare to get the best out of it.Method in the sense, first boil it in water and then add milk.Directly adding into milk will also give you the good taste but the colour will fade away in that case.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Recently, I visited a relative in Dubai and tasted Society Masala tea for the 1st time.  I simply loved it, more so when I found real ingredients like cinnamon, cardamom, ginger etc. written on the box.  I ordered same tea in india once I got back and I am shocked to see that there are no real ingredients.  The box says there are added 'flovors' only.  How disgusting to find that what is sold in india and exported abroad is totally different.  I wish I could return the tea but unfortunately, Amazon does not accept return of food items.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Recently, I visited a relative in Dubai and tasted Society Masala tea for the 1st time.  I simply loved it, more so when I found real ingredients like cinnamon, cardamom, ginger etc. written on the box.  I ordered same tea in india once I got back and I am shocked to see that there are no real ingredients.  The box says there are added 'flovors' only.  How disgusting to find that what is sold in india and exported abroad is totally different.  I wish I could return the tea but unfortunately, Amazon does not accept return of food items.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: When you need just one cup of tea and are too lazy to go through the whole rigmarole, this product is a lifesaver!Just heat water (optionally, add some milk for a richer taste) in a cup in the microwave, then drop in a heaped scoop of this premix. Voila, your tea is ready - no utensils to wash, no gas needed, no tea leaves to throw and no tea filter to clean.Decent in taste, full marks for convenience, this is a must-have in my kitchen.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: Great taste. Bought it for my parents as they prefer mild teas and it is great for both mild and strong teas. We add a bit more leaves to make it strong. Boil the leaves only for masala chai.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: It is strong and tastes very good. After trying almost 10 different brands of tea, I have found the one I like. I have tried Taj Mahal, Red label, RCM and many different others.I like my tea strong and for that you don't have to add too much of this tea. It is not just too strong tea, it tastes good. Most in my family like it and this is the one we are going to use from now on along with Red Label for those who like Red Label more.And Amazon, from time to time, provides good discounts on products and makes them affordable for all. Btw, it sells for 355 next door mall when Amazon is selling it for 385. I know shipping costs, so it is ok.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: We in our family have switched from Red Label to Tata Tea Gold now.Red Label is not bad, its just this one is better.This tea is perfect blend of aroma, taste and strong nature of tea. This is perfectly balanced tea between taste and kadak chai.Wagh bakri Tea is too strong with awful taste and Red Label is not so strong but taste good.This one got balanced both of it. So a must buy.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Reviewing CTC tea can be tricky: everyone has their own preferences. Flavour profiles that one has become accustomed to often determines how one reacts to a new tea.For the purpose of making milk tea,  this particular brand is quite good: a strong combination of good colour, definitely pleasing fragrance and taste that's firm but not too overpowering.This is a good option for someone used to tee leaves made by the likes of Wagh Bakri. This has slightly more liquor to it than the Wagh Bakhri and the fragrance spectrum is a bit wider.If you're the type who likes your Tata Agni and similar robust and bolder tea leaves then this may not be what you're looking for.It's price point is on the higher side and may be a factor for many. That said,  if you enjoy that one good cup a day,  it's a worthy buy-in.My recommendation: certainly worth a try especially if you like a good,  developed flavour in your cuppa.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Reviewing CTC tea can be tricky: everyone has their own preferences. Flavour profiles that one has become accustomed to often determines how one reacts to a new tea.For the purpose of making milk tea,  this particular brand is quite good: a strong combination of good colour, definitely pleasing fragrance and taste that's firm but not too overpowering.This is a good option for someone used to tee leaves made by the likes of Wagh Bakri. This has slightly more liquor to it than the Wagh Bakhri and the fragrance spectrum is a bit wider.If you're the type who likes your Tata Agni and similar robust and bolder tea leaves then this may not be what you're looking for.It's price point is on the higher side and may be a factor for many. That said,  if you enjoy that one good cup a day,  it's a worthy buy-in.My recommendation: certainly worth a try especially if you like a good,  developed flavour in your cuppa.
cleaned_review: reviewing ctc tea tricky everyone preferences flavour profiles one become accustomed often determines one reacts new teafor purpose making milk tea particular brand quite good strong combination good colour definitely pleasing fragrance taste thats firm overpoweringthis good option someone used tee leaves made likes wagh bakri slightly liquor wagh bakhri fragrance spectrum bit widerif youre type likes tata agni similar robust bolder tea leaves may youre looking forits price point higher side may factor many said enjoy one good cup day worthy buyinmy recommendation certainly worth try especially like good developed flavour cuppa

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: I was using Red label since ages and some time back switched to Tata Gold tea for some reason.I must say Tata gold is way cheaper and tests much batter than Red Label.Also quantity required to make a cup of tea is lesser compared to Red Label.These are my reasons to switch to Tata Gold:  1. name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: One of the best tea from the house of Tata and it is is a beautiful tea having good taste and flavour... actually it is an appropriate mixture of CTC and leaf tea..I ordered this product from Amazon and it was delivered on the next day in a very good packaging... I got it at discounted price...I got the product at 15% discounted price, as I bought the product during Super Value Days.The manufacturing date of product was just 2 and half months ago from date when I received the product in hand. Hence it is recently manufactured product. Also the product have a very good shelf life.Amazon delivered the product in very good condition and packaging of the product was just awesome. No damage. Amazing...The Amazon pantry box are very hard and during packaging they insert air filled sealed packets, so that the items don't move and pressure is absorbed by the air filled packets.Delivery of my order was just the next day morning. The delivery man took the package inside of my house, as it was heavy and kept the pantry box over a table, as I told him. I behavior of the delivery man was good.I am highly satisfied with the product and I recommend you to buy the product without any fear and hesitation. Believe me you will be satisfied after receiving the product and using it.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: If you really a teas fan, you definitely not being unaware of the TATA Tea family. Trusted brand from so many years. I tried almost every standard brand of Teas available in the market, but at last I can say that TATA Tea is the best available brand in the printed price. Although TATA Tea brand is already quite efficient in serving the purpose but the current addition of 'TATA Tea Gold' actually makes sense because of the quality enhancement by adding dried whole tea leaves in to the processed tea. Mixing of whole leaf resulted into the enhanced flavor & color of the prepared Tea. Not more concentrated not milder, it‚Äôs like a balanced golden color with real taste/flavor which designed exactly keeping in mind the expectation of the user.1. I agree that if you require strong color/flavor you need to add a little more leaves in to the preparation because TATA Tea Gold is not meant for people who like very strong color seekers. name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: Tata Tea Agni is good but the quality of this tea have changed a lot previously there was some leaves but nowadays Tata Tea Agni contains only powder tea or dust tea, it gives good liquor but not so much flavour.If you want good liquor along with flavour then you must go for Tata Gold tea that is a good tea. I bought Tata Tea Agni from Amazon at a very low price compared to the MRP and the packaging of the product was really awesome and it was delivered to my home address Durgapur Rana Pratap Road West Bengal within 5 days of ordering.If you want to buy good quality tea with good flavour then you should buy Tata Gold tea, Taj Mahal tea or Darjeeling tea.

It tracks the sleep time as well which will be displayed on a phone. Hope this was helpful For you.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: Pros -Looks goodIndian brandConsThe software is poor.The band and app get updated everyday for bug fixes, but the update never completes.Sleep tracker doesn't work properly - no auto sensor, it depends on manual time feeding for sleep, plus sleep data changes of band firmware update causes sudden change in connection.Call notification does not work. It worked for a couple of calls, but then stopped on its own.Though the sedentary reminder was switched off, the band keeps vibrating every 15 minutes for reminding, even while walking or doing work. It stops only in night mode or when active workout is on.

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: I have to thank the amazon recommendation engine for suggesting the mysore sandal talc. I never knew mysore sandal brand had a talc! I had purchased mysore sandal soap few weeks back and perhaps due to this purchase amazon would have recommended this as well. Glad I clicked the suggestion and bought one of these! It's good bye to my existing Ponds Sandalwood talc !This review compares Mysore sandal talc vis-a-vis Ponds Sandalwood talcPros-1. The Fragrance is the first thing which hits you as soon as you open the bottle. Its smells pure authentic sandal wood than the perfumed ponds talc powder2. The mysore sandal talc allows you to decide the size of the hole you want to have on the bottle. Ponds one forces you to have 3 holes as soon as you want the top cover. I always hated this with the ponds talc. Ponds really wants you to use more than what you need!3. The fragrance last longer than the ponds sandalwood talc even though out the day! Believe it or not - you have to try one and be the judge!4. Some reviews talk about the powder not been finely powdered. Nothing like that - the powder is as fine as it's with Ponds sandalwood talc. No more no less!5. The bottle is sealed with a hologram sticker - that's assurance of genuine product from mysore sandal!6. Somehow I like the press-fit top of the bottle to keep the fragrance intact in the bottle when not in use! Ponds bottle was a twist to close top which is not really a seal tight way of shutting close the bottle7. Last but not the least- mysore sandal talc is 50% cheaper than Ponds sandalwood - why on earth would I ever buy Ponds again?Cons-None that i spotted yet
cleaned_review: thank amazon recommendation engine suggesting mysore sandal talc never knew mysore sandal brand talc purchased mysore sandal soap weeks back perhaps due purchase amazon would recommended well glad clicked suggestion bought one good bye existing ponds sandalwood talc review compares mysore sandal talc visavis ponds sandalwood talcpros fragrance first thing hits soon open bottle smells pure authentic sandal wood perfumed ponds talc powder mysore sandal talc allows decide size hole want bottle ponds one forces holes soon want top cover always hated ponds talc ponds really wants use need fragrance last longer ponds sandalwood talc even though day believe try one judge reviews talk powder finely powdered nothing like powder fine ponds sandalwood talc less bottle sealed hologram sticker thats assurance genuine product mysore sandal somehow like pressfit top bottle keep fragrance intact bottle use ponds bottle twist close top really seal tight way shutting close bottle last least mysore sandal talc cheaper ponds sandalwood earth would ever buy ponds againconsnone spotted yet

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum

Wanted to return the items, but being a toiletry product, there is no such option. Very unhappy with the purchase

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: I have to thank the amazon recommendation engine for suggesting the mysore sandal talc. I never knew mysore sandal brand had a talc! I had purchased mysore sandal soap few weeks back and perhaps due to this purchase amazon would have recommended this as well. Glad I clicked the suggestion and bought one of these! It's good bye to my existing Ponds Sandalwood talc !This review compares Mysore sandal talc vis-a-vis Ponds Sandalwood talcPros-1. The Fragrance is the first thing which hits you as soon as you open the bottle. Its smells pure authentic sandal wood than the perfumed ponds talc powder2. The mysore sandal talc allows you to decide the size of the hole you want to have on the bottle. Ponds one forces you to have 3 holes as soon as you want the top cover. I always hated this with the ponds talc. Ponds really wants you to use more than what you need!3. The fragrance last longer than the ponds sandalwood talc even though out the day! Believe it or not - you have to try one and be the judge!4. Some reviews talk about the powder not been finely powdered. Nothing like that - the powder is as fine as it's with Ponds sandalwood talc. No more no less!5. The bottle is sealed with a hologram sticker - that's assurance of genuine product from mysore sandal!6. Somehow I like the press-fit top of the bottle to keep the fragrance intact in the bottle when not in use! Ponds bottle was a twist to close top which is not really a seal tight way of shutting close the bottle7. Last but not the least- mysore sandal talc is 50% cheaper than Ponds sandalwood - why on earth would I ever buy Ponds again?Cons-None that i spotted yet
cleaned_review: thank amazon recommendation engine suggesting mysore sandal talc never knew mysore sandal brand talc purchased mysore sandal soap weeks back perhaps due purchase amazon would recommended well glad clicked suggestion bought one good bye existing ponds sandalwood talc review compares mysore sandal talc visavis ponds sandalwood talcpros fragrance first thing hits soon open bottle smells pure authentic sandal wood perfumed ponds talc powder mysore sandal talc allows decide size hole want bottle ponds one forces holes soon want top cover always hated ponds talc ponds really wants use need fragrance last longer ponds sandalwood talc even though day believe try one judge reviews talk powder finely powdered nothing like powder fine ponds sandalwood talc less bottle sealed hologram sticker thats assurance genuine product mysore sandal somehow like pressfit top bottle keep fragrance intact bottle use ponds bottle twist close top really seal tight way shutting close bottle last least mysore sandal talc cheaper ponds sandalwood earth would ever buy ponds againconsnone spotted yet

name: Mysore-Whitening-Rejuvenating-Face-Pack
review: I bought this on a lark and it had been sitting on a shelf for a very long time. Till I developed warts on my chin. No amount of pulling and scrubbing helped and I was reluctant to use over-the-counter wart paint because of all the pharma warnings on them.I decided to use this clay on the warts, covering them with a generous coat of the clay twice a day and kept it on day and night for a month. Voila!I had to be patient but a month of application fixed my skin. Whatever this face pack contains, it is extremely effective. I used to a feel a constant sting after application but it can be ignored. The best part is that it didn't affect healthy skin adversely unlike wart paints which require precautions.Caution - These warts weren't because of an STD. I probably picked them up at the gym or some other place with too many people milling around in sweat. Please seek your doctor's advice if you have an STD. This face pack should not be applied on your eyelids or where you have a chance of ingesting it. Read disclaimers on the package.
cleaned_review: bought lark sitting shelf long time till developed warts chin amount pulling scrubbing helped reluctant use overthecounter wart paint pharma warnings themi decided use clay warts covering generous coat clay twice day kept day night month voilai patient month application fixed skin whatever face pack contains extremely effective used feel constant sting application ignored best part didnt affect healthy skin adversely unlike wart paints require precautionscaution warts werent std probably picked gym place many people milling around sweat please seek doctors advice std face pack applied eyelids chance ingesting read disclaimers package
